description: During her interview, Leah Wilde tells us she has just started doing bondage recently, as opposed to boy/girl straight porn. I hand her a vibrator and tell her to masturbate. I watch as she instinctively goes into porn mode, making eyes and playing to the camera. I tell her to stop, to ignore the camera, to be herself. She does for a while, but soon slips back to familiar mannerisms.When the chains and belts come out, her eyes widen and her breathing quickens. She starts to whimper even before I'm finished strapping her down. I can't tell if she's acting anymore. One thing I can tell for sure is that she's never done anything like this.
title: The Taming
